official_title: To provide for monthly reporting of child support obligations to certain consumer reporting agencies.
short_title: Child Support Credit Bureau Reporting Act of 1995

summary.text: Child Support Credit Bureau Reporting Act of 1995 - Amends part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of title IV of the Social Security Act to require States to establish procedures for monthly reporting to certain consumer reporting agencies of child support obligations owed by absent parents. Requires prior notice to such parents and a reasonable opportunity for them to contest the accuracy of any information about overdue support payable that would be provided to such agencies.

titles.title: Child Support Credit Bureau Reporting Act of 1995
To provide for monthly reporting of child support obligations to certain consumer reporting agencies.
